channel.title: 508-Adding Commands
channel.description:
[center]Alright; So today i was messing with my 508 Source When i noticed i didint have ::Banuser ::Unban ::Ipban ::Ipmute Commands, They were, never built into the source; I Was Wondering If, Anyone Knew How Too make those commands; & Could Tell me where too put them it would be a big thanks ~Aeolian.[/center]
[b]-Fixed,[No Need For Help][/b]

item.title: 508-Adding Commands

Thx guys for trying too help,

I Found Out How Too Do it , my self for finding some (TuTs)

item.title: 508-Adding Commands
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:9, topic:292999”][quote author=raped by who link=topic=387152.msg2901149#msg2901149 date=1249523832]

it really wasn’t meant to work; just kinda a base.

People expect to be handed everything on a platter nowadays
[/quote]

it’s been like that for over a year.[/quote]

True. I haven’t really messed around with mopar much.
Im only here to help the noobs that need it badly lul.

  • I understand having a question about a TRUE problem. A real java error, where you’ve actually tried to fix it, and cant seem to do it.
  • But, half the people that ask questions, ask like 3 or more a day… Honestly, http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

sigh What are you gonna do

Read full topic

item.title: 508-Adding Commands
item.dc:creator: @blood5 blood5
item.description:
@blood5 wrote:

here banuser commands u have make a text thing name it banlogs

if (command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 1) {
            String victim = command.substring(8);

            PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff " + playerName + " is banning "
                    + victim;
            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
            appendToBanned(victim);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                    }
                }
            }

Read full topic

item.title: 508-Adding Commands
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

example for ban command:

create an ArrayList:

List<String> bannedplayers = new ArrayList<String>();

add this command:

if(cmd[0].equals("ban") { String args = cmd[0].split(" "); String[] ban = cmd[0].args[1]; bannedplayers.add(ban[1]); }

and then whatever handles player logging, just add this:

if(playerName.equals(bannedplayers) disconnect = true;

this probably won’t work because i don’t really know anything about the 508 protocol but whatever. btw i used an ArrayList because i cbf to use a BufferedWriter.

Read full topic
